smtp.title: Connect Your Email
smtp.description: We'll use your email to send job applications on your behalf.
smtp.why_app_password_desc: For security, Google and Microsoft don't allow external apps to use your main password. You need to create a special "App Password" ‚Äî it only works for sending emails and can be revoked anytime.
smtp.gmail_step1: Enable 2-Step Verification (2FA) on your Google account
smtp.gmail_step2: Go to App Passwords and create one named "H2 Linker"
smtp.outlook_step1: Enable 2-Step Verification on your Microsoft account
smtp.outlook_step3: Create a new app password and copy it
smtp.password_hint: Paste the 16-character password here (you can paste without spaces)

warmup.title: Protect Your Reputation
warmup.subtitle: Configure smart email warm-up
warmup.why_desc: Providers like Gmail and Outlook monitor sending patterns. If you send too many emails at once with a new account, you risk:
warmup.why_point1: Your emails going straight to Spam
warmup.recommendation_desc: For new users, we recommend the "Standard" profile. It offers the best balance between speed and safety. Experienced users with already warmed accounts may consider "Aggressive".
warmup.how_it_works: Your limit increases automatically each day you use at least 80% of your quota. The more consistent you are, the faster you reach your plan's maximum speed.

help.title: How to generate an App Password
help.intro_body: To connect your email safely, you should not use your normal login password.
help.security_body: Google and Microsoft require an App Password: a special code that allows sending emails without exposing your main password.
help.gmail_warning: Note: to see this option, you must have 2-Step Verification (2FA) enabled.
help.gmail_steps:
Open your Google Account (myaccount.google.com) and go to Security.
Make sure 2-Step Verification is ON (turn it on if needed).
Use the search bar and type: App passwords.
Open App passwords (Google may ask for your password again).
In Select app, choose Other (Custom name).
Type: H2 Linker.
Click Generate and copy the 16-character password.
help.gmail_tip: Tip: you can paste it without spaces.
help.outlook_steps:
Open your Microsoft account (account.microsoft.com) and go to Security.
Open Advanced security options.
Enable 2-step verification (2FA) if it‚Äôs off.
Find App passwords.
Click Create a new app password.
Copy the generated password and paste it into the app.
help.faq_a_safe: Yes. This password is only for sending email. You can revoke access by deleting the app password without changing your main password.
help.faq_a_where: Here in Settings ‚Üí SMTP, in the ‚ÄúApp password‚Äù field.

auth_failed.title: Authentication failed
auth_failed.description: Incorrect or expired app password. For Gmail, generate a new App Password at myaccount.google.com > Security > App Passwords.

app_password_required.title: App password required
app_password_required.description: Gmail requires an App Password (not your regular password). Go to myaccount.google.com > Security > App Passwords to generate one.

connection_timeout.title: Connection timeout
connection_timeout.description: Could not connect to the SMTP server in time. Check your internet and try again.

connection_refused.title: Connection refused
connection_refused.description: The SMTP server refused the connection. Check if the provider (Gmail/Outlook) is correct in settings.

connection_closed.title: Connection closed
connection_closed.description: The SMTP server closed the connection unexpectedly. Try again in a few minutes.

tls_error.title: Security error (TLS/SSL)
tls_error.description: Secure connection to the server failed. Check if the selected provider is correct.

recipient_rejected.title: Recipient rejected
recipient_rejected.description: The recipient's email was rejected by the server. The address may not exist or be incorrect.

mailbox_full.title: Mailbox full
mailbox_full.description: The recipient's mailbox is full. Try again later.

rate_limited.title: Send limit reached
rate_limited.description: You've reached the sending limit. Wait a while before trying again or upgrade your plan.

blocked_spam.title: Blocked as spam
blocked_spam.description: The email was blocked by the server's anti-spam policies. Review the template content or wait a few hours.

smtp_not_configured.title: SMTP not configured
smtp_not_configured.description: Your SMTP credentials are not set up. Go to Settings > Email to configure.

function_not_found.title: SMTP not configured or password missing
function_not_found.description: Your SMTP credentials were not found. Go to Settings > Email, enter your email and Gmail App Password, and save again.

function_not_deployed.title: Email function not available
function_not_deployed.description: The email sending function is not accessible on the server. Try using the 'Send All' button (which uses a different route) or contact support to check Edge Functions deployment on Supabase.

server_error.title: Internal server error
server_error.description: An error occurred on the email server. Try again in a few minutes. If it persists, reconfigure your SMTP password.

session_expired.title: Session expired
session_expired.description: Your session has expired. Log out and log back in to continue sending emails.

missing_email.title: Email missing
missing_email.description: The recipient's email is empty. Check the job data.

invalid_domain.title: Invalid domain
invalid_domain.description: The recipient's email domain does not exist or does not accept emails.

profile_incomplete.title: Profile incomplete
profile_incomplete.description: Complete your profile (name, age, phone, contact email) before sending.

no_template.title: No template found
no_template.description: No email template configured. Create a template in Settings > Templates.

unknown.title: Unknown error
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred while sending. Try again or check your SMTP settings.

features.ai_real_writer: Real AI Writer (Unique email per job)
features.ai_real_writer_tooltip: Each email is generated from scratch by AI, personalized for the specific job. No two emails will be alike.
features.resume_gold_tooltip: AI-optimized resume tailored for your chosen visa category. Professional formatting with sector-specific language.
features.resume_diamond_tooltip: Get both H-2A (Agricultural) and H-2B (Non-Agricultural) optimized resume versions simultaneously.
features.resume_black_tooltip: Generate up to 5 sector-optimized resume versions. Each resume is tailored to match specific job categories for maximum callback rate.
features.resume_view_tracking_tooltip: Know when recruiters view your public profile with resume. Track real interest from each company.
features.mask_user_agent_tooltip: Masks technical information from your sends to reduce chances of being blocked by spam filters.
features.antispam_armored_tooltip: Advanced protection layer with multiple obfuscation techniques for maximum deliverability.
features.dns_bounce_check_tooltip: Validates the domain's MX record before sending. Prevents bounces and protects your sender reputation.
features.delay_gold_tooltip: Fixed 15-second interval between each send to protect your reputation.
features.delay_diamond_tooltip: Random interval between 15 and 45 seconds between sends, varying naturally for greater security.
features.delay_black_tooltip: Random interval between 1 and 5 minutes between sends, simulating real human behavior for maximum protection against detection.

delay.detail_2: Helps reduce temporary blocks from providers.

queue_banner.title: Ready to get hired? üöÄ
queue_banner.subtitle: You have {{count}} applications ready to go. Don't let these opportunities expire‚Äîsend your emails now!

groups.a_tooltip: Group A jobs are first in the government's queue. They have the HIGHEST chance of getting approved before the annual visa cap is reached.
groups.b_tooltip: Processed right after Group A. Excellent chances of visa approval.
groups.cd_tooltip: Processed in the middle of the queue. Moderate chances, depending on how fast the annual cap is reached.
groups.risk_tooltip: Last in the queue. High risk of the annual visa cap being reached before these are reviewed.

visa.h2a_info: H-2A is agriculture: no annual cap and housing is mandatory.

benefits.housing_h2a: H-2A: housing is mandatory by visa rules.

details.title: Job Details
details.active_early_desc: This job was detected the moment it was submitted for government approval. Note: it is still awaiting final certification (may or may not be approved). Applying now ensures you arrive first‚Äîyour resume hits the recruiter's desk before the mass competition starts!
details.group_a_desc: Maximum priority jobs. These employers are in an active hiring phase and typically process automated applications faster.
details.group_general_desc: Verified job available for processing. Follows the platform's standard application and response flow.
details.early_access_evolution_text: This job was originally identified via Early Access and is now a confirmed official H-2A/H-2B order.

early_match.title: H2 Linker Intelligence: Ready to Apply
early_match.desc: This position has been officially approved. Our system identified it during the filing phase, giving you the chance to apply before everyone else. You are viewing a verified and active opportunity with a competitive head start.

radar.upgrade_cta: Upgrade to Diamond or Black plan to unlock Smart Radar ‚Äî your AI-powered job matching engine.

radar.scanning_desc: Your radar is actively monitoring for new matches.

radar.confirm_send_all: Send all {{count}} matches to your queue?

onboarding.title: Smart Radar
onboarding.description: Let our AI work while you focus on what matters.
onboarding.what_is_desc: It's your AI assistant. It monitors the H2 Linker database 24/7 and detects opportunities that match your profile in real-time.
onboarding.autopilot_desc: When you enable Auto-Send, Radar spots the perfect job and sends the application for you ‚Äî even while you sleep.

checklist.title: Set up your account
checklist.banner_desc: {{remaining}} step(s) left to start sending applications.

landing.hero_desc: Automate applications, track opens in real time and apply to dozens of verified DOL employers ‚Äî all from your own email inbox.
landing.stats_jobs_sub: Directly from the Department of Labor
landing.stats_update_sub: New jobs appear as soon as they're approved
landing.step1_desc: Upload as PDF or Word. The system extracts your data and personalizes each application.
landing.step2_desc: Connect Gmail or Outlook with an "App Password". Emails are sent from your inbox, no middlemen.
landing.step3_desc: Use ready-made templates or create your own. Our AI generates unique text for each job.
landing.step4_desc: Hundreds of jobs updated daily from DOL. Each listing shows full salary, weekly hours, season start date, required experience and minimum education ‚Äî real information to make the right decision.
landing.step5_desc: Select jobs, add to queue and fire off bulk applications with one click.
landing.step6_desc: After sending, keep an eye on your inbox. Employers reply directly to your email ‚Äî no middlemen.
landing.feat_warmup_desc: Progressive sending limit increase that protects your domain reputation and prevents blocks. Starts conservative and grows automatically.
landing.feat_ai_desc: Unique emails generated for each job, passing spam filters with natural language.
landing.feat_spy_desc: Filters antivirus scanners and shows only genuine employer opens.
landing.feat_autosend_desc: Radar detects a job matching your filters and sends the application automatically. You don't need to do anything.
landing.feat_delay_desc: Randomized intervals between sends simulating human behavior to protect your account.
landing.feat_aipref_desc: Full control over your email style: formality, opening, greeting, closing, length and emphasis like languages and availability.
landing.feat_jobcard_desc: Salary (min and max range), weekly hours, season start date, minimum experience required, education required and direct employer contact. Not a raw listing ‚Äî everything you need to decide before applying.
landing.feat_radar_desc: Set filters by sector, state and salary. New jobs enter your queue automatically, no manual search.
landing.feat_referrals_desc: Refer friends and earn extra sending credits. The more active referrals, the more applications per day ‚Äî for free.
landing.testimonial1_quote: I saw H2 Linker born from a real need. I was the guy spending hours in front of the screen writing down emails and sending them one by one. It was slow, exhausting, and I could barely send 20 applications a day. Today, my productivity went through the roof: I send over 200 emails just during my lunch break. The app took the weight of manual work off me and gave me time to focus on what really matters: preparing for interviews.
landing.pricing_benefit1: Access to all H-2A and H-2B jobs
landing.referral_desc: For free plan users, each friend you refer who activates their account increases your daily sending limit ‚Äî for free. It's the fastest way to speed up your applications without buying a paid plan.
landing.referral_step1_desc: Automatically generated in your profile after creating your account.
landing.referral_step2_desc: WhatsApp, Instagram, groups ‚Äî the more, the better.
landing.referral_step3_desc: Once your friend uses the system for the first time, the credit is yours.
landing.referral_step4_desc: Each active referral increases your daily application limit.
landing.requirements_title: What you need to get started
landing.requirements_desc: Have these items ready. The setup process takes less than 5 minutes and includes video tutorials for each step.
landing.req1_desc: Your updated resume. The system extracts data and personalizes each application automatically.
landing.req2_desc: Emails are sent from YOUR outbox. You keep full control over what is sent.
landing.req3_desc: A special password (not your regular one) generated by Google or Microsoft to authorize SMTP sends. Tutorial included.
landing.req4_desc: You choose the jobs, build the queue and decide when to send. Nothing happens without your command.
landing.faq1_q: Does H2 Linker guarantee I'll get the job?
landing.faq1_a: No ‚Äî and any platform that promises that is lying. H2 Linker is not an employment agency and has no power to hire anyone. We are a facilitator: our job is to put your resume in front of as many verified employers as possible, as quickly as possible, with the best presentation possible. The H-2A and H-2B process is a game of timing and volume. Whoever applies first, with a professional and trackable email, gets ahead. We're here to make sure you play that game with every advantage.
landing.faq2_q: What is 'Early Access' and why is it so important?
landing.faq2_a: Early Access are H-2A jobs that just received the NOA (Notice of Acceptance) from the Department of Labor ‚Äî approved but not yet widely publicized. It's the golden window of the process: the employer just got the green light, is still building the team, and your application arrives before the competition. In H-2A, speed is everything. Employers receive hundreds of emails as the job gains visibility ‚Äî whoever arrives first stays in their memory. With Early Access, you're not competing with the crowd. You're at the front of the line.
landing.faq3_q: How does the system access my email?
landing.faq3_a: We don't access your password. You generate an 'App Password' in Google or Outlook that only allows sending messages. You maintain full control.
landing.faq4_a: Yes, all data is extracted and processed directly from the official Department of Labor (DOL) files in the US.
landing.faq5_q: How many emails can I send per day?
landing.faq5_a: It depends on your plan and your email warmup. The system starts with conservative sends and gradually increases to protect your reputation.
landing.final_cta_desc: Create your account in less than 2 minutes. No credit card required.
